Articles.Content: Hi everyone, I'm not new to the game but new to the forum ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Hello JET2, and welcome!

We are generally a very friendly and helpful community. Although we do engage in the occasional 'lively' debate.

Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
